import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; export default function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Mesajƒ±nƒ±z g√∂nderildi.
